org.apache.poi.ddf

Class EscherRecord

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.poi.ddf.EscherRecord
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Duplicatable, GenericRecord
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AbstractEscherOptRecord, EscherBlipRecord, EscherBSERecord, EscherChildAnchorRecord, EscherClientAnchorRecord, EscherClientDataRecord, EscherContainerRecord, EscherDggRecord, EscherDgRecord, EscherPlaceholder, EscherSpgrRecord, EscherSplitMenuColorsRecord, EscherSpRecord, EscherTextboxRecord, UnknownEscherRecord 

    public abstract class EscherRecord
extends java.lang.Object
implements Duplicatable, GenericRecord
    The base abstract record from which all escher records are defined. Subclasses will need to define methods for serialization/deserialization and for determining the record size.(从其定义所有escher记录的基抽象记录。子类需要定义用于序列化/重复化和确定记录大小的方法。)

      protected EscherRecord(EscherRecord other)

      abstract EscherRecord copy() 
      void display(java.io.PrintWriter w, int indent)
      The display methods allows escher variables to print the record names according to their hierarchy.(显示方法允许escher变量根据其层次结构打印记录名称。)
      protected int fillFields(byte[] data, EscherRecordFactory f)
      Delegates to fillFields(byte[], int, EscherRecordFactory)(fillFields的委托（byte[]，int，earth RecordFactory）)
      abstract int fillFields(byte[] data, int offset, EscherRecordFactory recordFactory)
      The contract of this method is to deserialize an escher record including it's children.(这种方法的契约是将escher记录重新数字化，包括其子记录。)

    • Method Detail

      • fillFields

        protected int fillFields(byte[] data,
                         EscherRecordFactory f)
        Delegates to fillFields(byte[], int, EscherRecordFactory)(fillFields的委托（byte[]，int，earth RecordFactory）)
        Parameters:
        data - they bytes to serialize from(数据-要序列化的字节)
        f - the escher record factory(艾舍唱片厂The Escher Record Factory)
        Returns:
        The number of bytes written.(写入的字节数。)
        See Also:
        fillFields(byte[], int, org.apache.poi.ddf.EscherRecordFactory)

      • fillFields

        public abstract int fillFields(byte[] data,
                               int offset,
                               EscherRecordFactory recordFactory)
        The contract of this method is to deserialize an escher record including it's children.(这种方法的契约是将escher记录重新数字化，包括其子记录。)
        Parameters:
        data - The byte array containing the serialized escher records.(data -包含序列化escher记录的字节数组。)
        offset - The offset into the byte array.(offset -字节数组的偏移量。)
        recordFactory - A factory for creating new escher records.(recordFactory -用于创建新escher记录的工厂。)
        Returns:
        The number of bytes written.(写入的字节数。)

      • readHeader

        protected int readHeader(byte[] data,
                         int offset)
        Reads the 8 byte header information and populates the options and recordId records.(读取8字节标头信息并填充选项和recordId记录。)
        Parameters:
        data - the byte array to read from(data -要读取的字节数组)
        offset - the offset to start reading from(offset -开始读取的偏移量)
        Returns:
        the number of bytes remaining in this record. This may include the children if this is a container.(此记录中剩余的字节数。如果这是一个容器，这可能包括孩子。)

      • readInstance

        protected static short readInstance(byte[] data,
                                    int offset)
        Read the options field from header and return instance part of it.(从标题中读取选项字段并返回其中的实例部分。)
        Parameters:
        data - the byte array to read from(data -要读取的字节数组)
        offset - the offset to start reading from(offset -开始读取的偏移量)
        Returns:
        value of instance part of options field(选项字段实例部分的值)

      • isContainerRecord

        public boolean isContainerRecord()
        Determine whether this is a container record by inspecting the option field.(通过检查选项字段确定这是否是容器记录。)
        Returns:
        true is this is a container field.(确实，这是一个容器字段。)

      • getOptions

        @Internal
public short getOptions()
        Note that options is an internal field. Use setInstance(short) ()} and setVersion(short) ()} to set the actual fields.(请注意，选项是一个内部字段。使用setInstance（Short）（）}和setVersion（Short）（）}来设置实际字段。)
        Returns:
        The options field for this record. All records have one.(此记录的选项字段。所有记录都有一个。)

      • setOptions

        @Internal
public void setOptions(short options)
        Set the options this this record. Container records should have the last nibble set to 0xF.

        Note that options is an internal field. Use getInstance() and getVersion() to access actual fields.

        (设置此记录的选项。容器记录应将最后一个半字节设置为0xF。请注意，选项是一个内部字段。使用getInstance（）和getVersion（）访问实际字段。)
        Parameters:
        options - the record options(选项-记录选项)

      • serialize

        public byte[] serialize()
        Serializes to a new byte array. This is done by delegating to serialize(int, byte[]);(序列化为新字节数组。这是通过委托serialize（int，byte[]）来完成的;)
        Returns:
        the serialized record.(连载记录。)
        See Also:
        serialize(int, byte[])

      • serialize

        public int serialize(int offset,
                     byte[] data)
        Serializes to an existing byte array without serialization listener. This is done by delegating to serialize(int, byte[], EscherSerializationListener).(序列化为现有的字节数组，而不使用序列化侦听器。这是通过委托序列化（int，byte[]，earth SerializationHandler）来完成的。)
        Parameters:
        offset - the offset within the data byte array.(Offset -数据字节数组内的偏差。)
        data - the data array to serialize to.(data -要序列化的数据数组。)
        Returns:
        The number of bytes written.(写入的字节数。)
        See Also:
        serialize(int, byte[], org.apache.poi.ddf.EscherSerializationListener)

      • serialize

        public abstract int serialize(int offset,
                              byte[] data,
                              EscherSerializationListener listener)
        Serializes the record to an existing byte array.(将记录序列化为现有字节数组。)
        Parameters:
        offset - the offset within the byte array(Offset -字节数组内的偏差)
        data - the data array to serialize to(data -要序列化到的数据数组)
        listener - a listener for begin and end serialization events. This is useful because the serialization is hierarchical/recursive and sometimes you need to be able break into that.(listener -开始和结束序列化事件的侦听器。这很有用，因为序列化是分层/递归的，有时你需要能够打破它。)
        Returns:
        the number of bytes written.(写入的字节数。)

      • getRecordSize

        public abstract int getRecordSize()
        Subclasses should effeciently return the number of bytes required to serialize the record.(子类应该有效地返回序列化记录所需的字节数。)
        Returns:
        number of bytes(的字节数)

      • getRecordId

        public short getRecordId()
        Return the current record id.(返回当前记录id。)
        Returns:
        The 16 bit record id.(16位记录id。)

      • setRecordId

        public void setRecordId(short recordId)
        Sets the record id for this record.(设置此记录的记录ID。)
        Parameters:
        recordId - the record id(recordId -记录ID)

      • getChildRecords

        public java.util.List<EscherRecord> getChildRecords()
        Returns:
        Returns the children of this record. By default this will be an empty list. EscherCotainerRecord is the only record that may contain children.(返回此记录的子项。默认情况下，这将是一个空列表。earth CovainerRecord是唯一可能包含子项的记录。)
        See Also:
        EscherContainerRecord

      • setChildRecords

        public void setChildRecords(java.util.List<EscherRecord> childRecords)
        Sets the child records for this record. By default this will throw an exception as only EscherContainerRecords may have children.(设置此记录的子记录。默认情况下，这将引发异常，因为只有earth ContainerRecords可以有子项。)
        Parameters:
        childRecords - Not used in base implementation.(childRecords -在基本实现中不使用。)

      • getChild

        public EscherRecord getChild(int index)
        Returns the indexed child record.(返回索引的子记录。)
        Parameters:
        index - the index of the child within the child records(index -子记录中子的索引)
        Returns:
        the indexed child record(索引子记录)

      • display

        public void display(java.io.PrintWriter w,
                    int indent)
        The display methods allows escher variables to print the record names according to their hierarchy.(显示方法允许escher变量根据其层次结构打印记录名称。)
        Parameters:
        w - The print writer to output to.(w -要输出的印刷版作家。)
        indent - The current indent level.(- 当前)
